Text: Coool! Thanks! Should be in class with Turkish Star Wars :)

Great upload. More popularly known as Zinda Laash or The Living Corpse, this movie was Pakistan's first venture into horror movies and is perhaps inspiration for a more recent (and much more acclaimed) slasher flick from there called Zibahkhana or Hell's Ground.
